LanguageData.SY_BR.MeatModifierDesc:
Meat yield of a rotting corpse default: {default}
0 = 0% 1 = 100%
LanguageData.SY_BR.LeatherModifierDesc:
Leather yield of a rotting corpse default: {default}
0 = 0% 1 = 100%
LanguageData.SY_BR.OtherModifierDesc:
Other products's yield of a rotting corpse (for example elephant tusks or thrumbo horns) default: {default}
0 = 0% 1 = 100%
LanguageData.SY_BR.VarianceModifierDesc:
Adds a yield variance modifier (there will always be a variation of +/-1) default: {default}
0.0 = disabled 0.1 = 10% yield variation 0.5 = 50% yield variation 1.0 = 100% yield variation - results in yields between 0 and twice the amount depending on the respective modifier
